names.english: nourish, preserve and protect yin decoction
names.commonEnglish: Nourish, Preserve and Protect Yin Decoction

actions: Nourishes Liver and Kidney Yin, nourishes Jing and Blood and fills the Marrow.
Tonifies the Liver and Kidneys, nourishes the Blood and nourishes Jing.
Nourishes and tonifies Liver and Kidney Blood and Yin, benefits Jing and brightens the eyes.
With Shu Di Huang, for Liver and Kidney Deficiency.
Tonifies Kidney Yin and astringes Jing.
Warms the Kidneys and the Lower Jiao, warms the Ming Men and fortifies the Yang.
Tonifies the Kidneys, strengthens Yang and increases the libido.
With Shan Yao, for a stronger action.
Induces sweating, releases the Exterior and warms and disperses Cold pathogens.
With Shu Di Huang, for coughing and wheezing associated with Kidney Yin Deficiency.
